metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25276 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: The Media oEmbed iframe route does not properly validate the iframe domainsetting, which allows embeds to be displayed in the context of the primarydomain. Under certain circumstances, this could lead to cross-sitescripting, leaked cookies, or other vulnerabilities.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
